name: APIs 101 with Postman
description: The virtual event is designed to provide an introduction to the basics of APIs using Postman. Participants will learn how to use Postman, a popular tool for working with APIs, to send and receive requests and understand the basic concepts of APIs. Participants will also have the opportunity to ask questions and interact with the instructor and other attendees. By the end of the event, participants will have a solid foundation in APIs and be able to apply their new knowledge to their own projects.
